verses.verse: And He entered <S%G1525><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into a synagogue; <S%G4864><s%> and a man <S%G444><s%> was there <S%G1563><s%> with a withered <S%G3583><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%>
And they were watching <S%G3906><s%> Him [to see] if <S%G1487><s%> He would heal <S%G2323><s%> him on the Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that they might accuse <S%G2723><s%> Him.
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to the man <S%G444><s%> with the withered <S%G3584><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> "Rise <S%G1453><s%> and [come] forward <S%G1519><s%>! <S%G3319><s%>"

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> on the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G18><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> to do <S%G2554><s%> harm, <S%G2554><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> a life <S%G5590><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%>?" But they kept <S%G4623><s%> silent. <S%G4623><s%>

And after looking <S%G4017><s%> around <S%G4017><s%> at them with anger, <S%G3709><s%> grieved <S%G4818><s%> at their hardness <S%G4457><s%> of heart, <S%G2588><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to the man, <S%G444><s%> "Stretch <S%G1614><s%> out your hand. <S%G5495><s%>" And he stretched <S%G1614><s%> it out, and his hand <S%G5495><s%> was restored. <S%G600><s%>

And the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out and immediately <S%G2117><s%> [began] taking <S%G1325><s%> counsel <S%G4824><s%> with the Herodians <S%G2265><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> Him, [as to] how <S%G3704><s%> they might destroy <S%G622><s%> Him.

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> withdrew <S%G402><s%> to the sea <S%G2281><s%> with His disciples; <S%G3101><s%> and a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> from Galilee <S%G1056><s%> followed; <S%G190><s%> and [also] from Judea, <S%G2453><s%>

and from Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and from Idumea, <S%G2401><s%> and beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> and the vicinity <S%G4012><s%> of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and Sidon, <S%G4605><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> of all <S%G3745><s%> that He was doing <S%G4160><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to Him.

And He told <S%G3004><s%> His disciples <S%G3101><s%> that a boat <S%G4142><s%> should stand <S%G4342><s%> ready <S%G4342><s%> for Him because <S%G1223><s%> of the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that they might not crowd <S%G2346><s%> Him;

for He had healed <S%G2323><s%> many, <S%G4183><s%> with the result <S%G5620><s%> that all <S%G3745><s%> those who <S%G3745><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> afflictions <S%G3148><s%> pressed <S%G1968><s%> about <S%G1968><s%> Him in order <S%G2443><s%> to touch <S%G681><s%> Him.

And whenever <S%G3752><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> beheld <S%G2334><s%> Him, they would fall <S%G4363><s%> down <S%G4363><s%> before <S%G4363><s%> Him and cry <S%G2896><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "You are the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>"
And He earnestly <S%G4183><s%> warned <S%G2008><s%> them not to make <S%G4160><s%> Him known. <S%G5318><s%>
And He went <S%G305><s%> up to the mountain <S%G3735><s%> and summoned <S%G4341><s%> those whom <S%G3739><s%> He Himself <S%G846><s%> wanted, <S%G2309><s%> and they came <S%G565><s%> to Him.
And He appointed <S%G4160><s%> twelve, <S%G1427><s%> that they might be with Him, and that He might send <S%G649><s%> them out to preach, <S%G2784><s%>
and to have <S%G2192><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> to cast <S%G1544><s%> out the demons. <S%G1140><s%>
And He appointed <S%G4160><s%> the twelve: <S%G1427><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> (to whom He gave <S%G2007><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>),

and James, <S%G2385><s%> the [son] of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%> of James <S%G2385><s%> (to them He gave <S%G2007><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> Boanerges, <S%G993><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> means, <S%G1510><s%> "Sons <S%G5207><s%> of Thunder <S%G1027><s%>");

and Andrew, <S%G406><s%> and Philip, <S%G5376><s%> and Bartholomew, <S%G918><s%> and Matthew, <S%G3102><s%> and Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> and James <S%G2385><s%> the [son] of Alphaeus, <S%G256><s%> and Thaddaeus, <S%G2280><s%> and Simon <S%G4613><s%> the Zealot; <S%G2581><s%>
and Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> betrayed <S%G3860><s%> Him.

And He came <S%G2064><s%> home, <S%G3624><s%> and the multitude <S%G3793><s%> gathered <S%G4905><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> to such <S%G5620><s%> an extent <S%G5620><s%> that they could <S%G1410><s%> not even <S%G3366><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> a meal. <S%G740><s%>

And when His own people heard <S%G191><s%> [of this,] they went <S%G1831><s%> out to take <S%G2902><s%> custody <S%G2902><s%> of Him; for they were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "He has lost <S%G1839><s%> His senses. <S%G1839><s%>"

And the scribes <S%G1122><s%> who came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "He is possessed <S%G2192><s%> by Beelzebul, <S%G954><s%>" and "He casts <S%G1544><s%> out the demons <S%G1140><s%> by the ruler <S%G758><s%> of the demons. <S%G1140><s%>"

And He called <S%G4341><s%> them to Himself and began speaking <S%G3004><s%> to them in parables, <S%G3850><s%> "How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> out Satan <S%G4567><s%>?
"And if <S%G1437><s%> a kingdom <S%G932><s%> is divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> itself, <S%G1438><s%> that kingdom <S%G932><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> stand. <S%G2476><s%>
"And if <S%G1437><s%> a house <S%G3614><s%> is divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> itself, <S%G1438><s%> that house <S%G3614><s%> will not be able <S%G1410><s%> to stand. <S%G2476><s%>

"And if <S%G1487><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> has risen <S%G450><s%> up against <S%G1909><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> and is divided, <S%G3307><s%> he cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> stand, <S%G2476><s%> but he is finished! <S%G5056><s%>

"But no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> the strong <S%G2478><s%> man <S%G2478><s%>'s house <S%G3614><s%> and plunder <S%G1283><s%> his property <S%G4632><s%> unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> he first <S%G4413><s%> binds <S%G1210><s%> the strong <S%G2478><s%> man, and then <S%G5119><s%> he will plunder <S%G1283><s%> his house. <S%G3614><s%>

"Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, all <S%G3956><s%> sins <S%G265><s%> shall be forgiven <S%G863><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> and whatever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G1437><s%> blasphemies <S%G988><s%> they utter; <S%G987><s%>

but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> blasphemes <S%G987><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> forgiveness, <S%G859><s%> but is guilty <S%G1777><s%> of an eternal <S%G166><s%> sin <S%G265><s%> " â€“
because <S%G3754><s%> they were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "He has <S%G2192><s%> an unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit. <S%G4151><s%>"
And His mother <S%G3384><s%> and His brothers <S%G80><s%> arrived, <S%G2064><s%> and standing <S%G4739><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> they sent <S%G649><s%> [word] to Him, and called <S%G2564><s%> Him.

And a multitude <S%G3793><s%> was sitting <S%G2521><s%> around <S%G4012><s%> Him, and they said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Your mother <S%G3384><s%> and Your brothers <S%G80><s%> are outside <S%G1854><s%> looking <S%G2212><s%> for You."
And answering <S%G611><s%> them, He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> are My mother <S%G3384><s%> and My brothers <S%G80><s%>?"

And looking <S%G4017><s%> about <S%G4017><s%> on those <S%G3588><s%> who were sitting <S%G2521><s%> around <S%G4012><s%> <S%G2945><s%> Him, He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Behold, <S%G2396><s%> My mother <S%G3384><s%> and My brothers! <S%G80><s%>
"For whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> does <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> he is My brother <S%G80><s%> and sister <S%G79><s%> and mother <S%G3384><s%>."
